metadata.name: Playground Fren #1
metadata.description: PLAYGROUND FRENS is a collection of chromed-out 3D frens on the Ethereum blockchain. Each NFT makes for a unique avatar - no two FRENS are alike. FRENS also grant access to GAME 001; a  winner-take-all on-chain elimination game with a grand prize. Incubated by RECESS DAO, PLAYGROUND FRENS is a showcase of the amazing capabilities of blockchain technology, which allows games to be built with fairness and transparency. The FRENS depict that as well; the playground is a world where there is no race, gender, or dress code. Come play.
metadata.creator: https://twitter.com/PlaygroundFrens
